= Download =

The latest release of scxmlcc is version 0.3, and can be downloaded here:

[http://scxmlcc.googlecode.com/svn/download/scxmlcc-0.3.tar.gz]

Older versions can be downloaded here: 

http://scxmlcc.googlecode.com/svn/download

Or, to optain scxmlCC using SVN, see the [https://code.google.com/p/scxmlcc/source/checkout Source] tab.
